channel.title: 667 Null on death

item.title: 667 Null on death
item.dc:creator: @Nookumdip Nookumdip
item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

Hello.

I added this very… Basic… title system based on killcounts.
And 1/4 times it nulls the whole server and spams chatbox with “Oh dear, you are dead!”

This is my code:

public void run() {
				if (loop == 0) {
					setNextAnimation(new Animation(836));
				} else if (loop == 1) {
					Player k = getMostDamageReceivedSourcePlayer();
					getPackets().sendGameMessage("Oh dear, you have died.");
					//sendItemsOnDeath(k);
					if (k != null) {
					getKillReward();
					} else {
						getKillReward();
					}
				} else if (loop == 3) {
						//killer.inventory.addItem(24158, 2);
					Player killer = getMostDamageReceivedSourcePlayer();
					if (killer != null) {
						killer.removeDamage(thisPlayer);
						
					}
					equipment.init();
					inventory.init();
					reset();
					
					setNextWorldTile(new WorldTile(
							Settings.RESPAWN_PLAYER_LOCATION));
					setNextAnimation(new Animation(-1));
				} else if (loop == 4) {
					getPackets().sendMusicEffect(90);
					stop();
				}
				loop++;
			}

			public void getKillReward() {
				Player killer = getMostDamageReceivedSourcePlayer();
				if (inventory.getFreeSlots() > 23) {
					killer.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Don't try to farm.");
				} else {
					killer.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You recieve 1 Million GP and 10 tokens for killing " + getUsername());
					killer.inventory.addItem(995, 1000000);
					sendItemsOnDeath(killer);
					killer.inventory.addItem(8851, 10);
					killer.increaseKillCount(thisPlayer);
					if (killer.getKillCount() == 10) {
						World.sendWorldWideMessage("<shad=D81010><col=F81818>" + killer.getDisplayName() + " has recieved Title: Sir (10 Killcount)");
						killer.getAppearence().setTitle(5);
					} else if (killer.getKillCount() == 20) {
						World.sendWorldWideMessage("<shad=D81010><col=F81818>" + killer.getDisplayName() + " has recieved Title: Lord (20 Killcount)");
						killer.getAppearence().setTitle(6);
					} else if (killer.getKillCount() == 30) {
						World.sendWorldWideMessage("<shad=D81010><col=F81818>" + killer.getDisplayName() + " has recieved Title: Lionheart (30 Killcount)");
						killer.getAppearence().setTitle(8);
					} else if (killer.getKillCount() == 40) {
						World.sendWorldWideMessage("<shad=D81010><col=F81818>" + killer.getDisplayName() + " has recieved Title: Hellraiser (40 Killcount)");
						killer.getAppearence().setTitle(9);
					} else if (killer.getKillCount() == 50) {
						World.sendWorldWideMessage("<shad=D81010><col=F81818>" + killer.getDisplayName() + " has recieved Title: Junior Cadet (50 Killcount)");
						killer.getAppearence().setTitle(1);
					} else if (killer.getKillCount() == 150) {
						World.sendWorldWideMessage("<shad=D81010><col=F81818>" + killer.getDisplayName() + " has recieved Title: Serjeant (150 Killcount)");
						killer.getAppearence().setTitle(2);
					} else if (killer.getKillCount() == 250) {
						World.sendWorldWideMessage("<shad=D81010><col=F81818>" + killer.getDisplayName() + " has recieved Title: Commander (250 Killcount)");
						killer.getAppearence().setTitle(3);
					} else if (killer.getKillCount() == 500) {
						World.sendWorldWideMessage("<shad=D81010><col=F81818>" + killer.getDisplayName() + " has recieved Title: War-Cheif! (500 KILLCOUNT!)");
						killer.getAppearence().setTitle(4);
					}
				}

I’ll be back soon, hopefully someone replies. :c
